response.original_title: Vi skulle dø - da AIDS kom til Danmark
response.overview: In the early 1980s, two young men move to different big cities. In Aarhus, Henning finally discovers the gay scene he had longed for as a teenager in rural Jutland, while in Copenhagen, Steve falls head over heels for the chef at the city’s best gay nightclub. Everything looks bright for Henning and Steve, until they first hear about a mysterious disease that seems to affect gay men almost exclusively – a disease with no cure.
response.title: Vi skulle dø - da AIDS kom til Danmark
